remarks: Less-than relation for ` G ` (see ~ om2uz0i ).  (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)
statement:
om2uz.1 $e |- C e. ZZ $.
om2uz.2 $e |- G = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) |` _om ) $.
om2uzlti $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( A e. B -> ( G ` A ) < ( G ` B ) ) ) $.
$d C x $.
